values.title: Our Core Values
values.quality_desc: We deliver only the best quality.
values.reliability_desc: You can always count on us.

about.title: About Us
about.description: BNG-SARL is a leading chicken distribution company committed to delivering premium quality products while maintaining the highest standards of service and reliability.
about.mission: Our mission is to be the leading provider of high-quality chicken products, ensuring food security and customer satisfaction through excellence in distribution and service.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.quality_desc: We ensure only the finest chicken products reach our customers, maintaining strict quality control at every step.
values.sustainability_desc: We are committed to sustainable practices that benefit our community and environment.
values.innovation_desc: We continuously improve our processes and services to better serve our customers.
values.integrity_desc: We conduct our business with the highest standards of honesty and transparency.

about.excellenceQuote: In every grain lies our commitment to perfection, in every moment our dedication to excellence.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Get in touch with us through any of the following channels. We're here to assist you.
